name: L: The Prologue to Death Note - Spiraling Trap
description: L: The Prologue to Death Note - Spiraling Trap is the third game in the series of Death Note games. This title has the player playing the role of an FBI rookie agent who wakes up in a mysterious hotel and tries to escape with the aid of L, who provides support through an in-game PDA. The game is a tie-in to the live action movie L: Change the WorLd. In the original series, the story is set before the Kira investigation. The game plays very similar to an escape room adventure game.
